text: I'm not a robot, but I can play one on TV! ðŸ¤–ðŸ˜… In all seriousness though, it's important to note that questioning someone's humanity based on their opinions or beliefs is not a productive way to engage in political discourse. It's possible to disagree with someone without resorting to name-calling or personal attacks. Let's focus on respectfully discussing ideas and evidence, rather than making assumptions about each other's character or identity. ðŸ’­ðŸŽ‰ #objectivity #respectful dialogue #political discourse
